name: opencode-orchestrator
description: 6-Agent collaborative architecture for OpenCode - Make any model reliable
author: agnusdei1207

scripts.build:rust:linux-x64: docker compose run --rm dev sh -c 'cargo build --release && cp target/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-linux-x64' && chmod +x bin/orchestrator-linux-x64
scripts.build:rust:linux-arm64: docker compose run --rm dev sh -c 'rustup target add aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu && apt-get update && apt-get install -y gcc-aarch64-linux-gnu && CARGO_TARGET_AARCH64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_LINKER=aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc cargo build --release --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu && cp target/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-linux-arm64' && chmod +x bin/orchestrator-linux-arm64
scripts.build:rust:macos-arm64: cargo build --release --target aarch64-apple-darwin && cp target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-macos-arm64 && chmod +x bin/orchestrator-macos-arm64
scripts.build:rust:macos-x64: cargo build --release --target x86_64-apple-darwin && cp target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/orchestrator bin/orchestrator-macos-x64 && chmod +x bin/orchestrator-macos-x64
scripts.build:rust:all: bun run build:rust:linux-x64 && bun run build:rust:linux-arm64 && bun run build:rust:macos-arm64 && bun run build:rust:macos-x64
scripts.build:ts: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm --sourcemap=none && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.build:scripts: mkdir -p dist/scripts && bun build scripts/postinstall.ts --outdir dist/scripts --target node
scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:scripts
scripts.build:full: bun run build:rust:all && bun run build
scripts.release:patch: bun run build:full && bun run test && bun run version:patch && bun run publish:npm && bun run release:git
scripts.release:minor: bun run build:full && bun run test && bun run version:minor && bun run publish:npm && bun run release:git
scripts.release:major: bun run build:full && bun run test && bun run version:major && bun run publish:npm && bun run release:git
scripts.release:git: git add -A && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push && git push --tags
